eligibility: Applicants must be U.S. citizens or permanent residents and are expected to have completed a U.S. internal medicine, family medicine, medicine–pediatrics, or infectious diseases fellowship prior to the start of the program.
The fellowship runs on a July–June academic calendar; off-cycle start dates may be accommodated on a case-by-case basis.

requiredDocuments.label: Completed HIV Clinical Leadership Fellowship Program Application
One-page letter of interest addressed to Shanna Livermore, Program Director
Two or three letters of recommendation (at least one must be from your current or most recent training program director)

contactInfo.instructions: Please email your complete application packet to Program Coordinator Shanna Livermore at shanna.livermore@med.usc.edu. If recommenders submit letters directly, please ask them to include the applicant’s name in their email subject line for tracking.
contactInfo.generalInquiries: For any general questions about the fellowship, contact Shanna Livermore at shanna.livermore@med.usc.edu.
